meanings.definition: A printing process in which a gelatin film is used to transfer an image onto paper.
meanings.sent1: Collotypy involves transferring images using a gelatin film.
meanings.sent2: The artist used collotypy to create beautiful prints of nature scenes.
meanings.sent3: I tried collotypy for the first time and accidentally made a print of my cat's paw.
meanings.sent4: Her collotypy skills were so precise, it was like watching magic unfold on paper.
meanings.sent5: The collotypy process requires patience and attention to detail.

meanings.definition: The act or process of making prints using collotype.
meanings.sent1: Collotypy is the method of creating prints with a specific technique.
meanings.sent2: The collotypy workshop taught participants how to make unique prints.
meanings.sent3: During the collotypy class, we accidentally spilled ink everywhere.
meanings.sent4: His collotypy expertise was like watching a master painter at work.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of collotypy lies in its ability to capture intricate details.
